about.subtitle: A simple and intuitive design is an effective design

paragraph.first: Our company is able to provide complete assistance in all phases of project development: clinical validation of the formulas conceived, development of the prototype, stability and efficacy assessments, training of those responsible for scientific dissemination.
paragraph.second: Ambrosialab represents an extremely competent external partner for client companies, which makes use of a set of resources, tools and cutting-edge technologies of its own and of the entire university network.
paragraph.third: Ambrosialab also offers research and development interventions through which you can have all the know-how necessary for the creation and marketing of your finished product.

paragraph.first: Ambrosialab is a research spinoff of the University of Ferrara, which holds 10% of the share capital. The R&D works in the field of life sciences and biotechnology, founded in 2003, on the initiative of Prof. Stefano Manfredini and Prof. Silvia Vertuani, after undergoing university incubation is now placed at its own facility near the University campus of Life, Health and Environment Sciences of the city of Ferrara.
paragraph.second: The location of the new headquarters, open in 2010, allows an effective interchange between the activities of research and development conducted by his staff, and the activities of basic research at the University, which acts as a driving force for technological innovation.
paragraph.third: Ambrosialab develops and produces prototypes of health products and drugs, in the field of degenerative diseases, aging and maintenance of health, from innovative concepts, often unique, patented, passing from their design to the implementation of small pilot production, required for the checks of efficacy and stability. The prototypes are then developed and marketed by partner companies.
paragraph.fourth: Ambrosialab supports, through Scholarships and Research Grants, the basic university research in the area of ‚Äã‚Äãoxidative stress and its related products. The strength of Ambrosialab resides in the network of industrial productive partnerships, in Italy and abroad.
paragraph.fifth: Ambrosialab also takes care of the QA steps and efficiency, necessary for the production phase and commercial products developed at its partner companies. These networks are increasingly consolidated over the years of activity.
paragraph.sixth: Its prime location in the university area but close to the motorway link and rail, are ideal for an effective technological exchange to its institutional partners.

activities.title: Cosmetics
activities.description: Research and development of new ingredients, prototypes and finished products, regulatory assistance.
activities.info: The consultancy on cosmetic products includes the execution of basic analyzes on raw materials and the creation of prototypes and finished products, up to the realization of the final formulation with the commissioning of the pilot test Thanks to a work team, heterogeneous in experience and professional training, the product development project is followed in all its facets, chemical, microbiological and practical. In particular, in the study of new formulations new products with a high technological content are created, continuously searching for new raw materials, which meet both the functional requirements and specific marketing requests. Scientific assistance for the development of customized applications and patented products. The technical skills acquired in the field of UV protection allow 360 ¬∞ assistance in the development of solar products.

activities.title: Supplements and Food
activities.description: Active ingredients research and product design. Regulatory support.
activities.info: Research and selection of active ingredients aimed at product design and enhancement of synergies between functional ingredients. Scientific support on a bibliographic basis of the effects claimed by the product. In particular, in the study of new formulations new products with a high technological content are created, continuously searching for new raw materials, which meet both the functional requirements and specific marketing requests. Scientific assistance for the development of customized applications and patented products.

activities.title: Medical Devices
activities.description: Search and selection of raw materials with mechanism consistent with the definition of MD.
activities.info: Research and selection of raw materials with a mechanism compatible with the definition of DM, aimed at the design and development of formulation prototypes (topical forms). Clinical evaluation on a bibliographic basis for the preparation of the technical file.

activities.title: Testing
activities.description: Clinical evaluations on cosmetic products and supplements.
activities.info: Clinical evaluations on cosmetic products and supplements, in particular: efficacy evaluations (hydration, sebometry, soothing action, elasticity, skin collagen, antioxidant capacity), safety evaluations (patch test, PAO, nickel test), home use tests on an appropriately selected panel of consumers. In vitro evaluations to provide information relating to the safety profile and functionality of the finished cosmetic product, in particular microbiological analyzes and stability studies, especially useful in the product development phase or as a screening test on raw materials in order to select the active ingredient with the best tolerability and efficacy profile. Processing and setting up of specific and personalized protocols in vitro and in vivo for the evaluation of the efficacy of cosmetics and supplements. Evaluation of the sun protection factor (SPF) in vivo and UVA in vitro according to the ISO protocol. Execution of analyzes and tests for quality control, in particular in vitro tests for the evaluation of the antioxidant capacity of raw materials and finished products.

activities.title: Patents
activities.description: Consultancy in the patents field, patent search and filling of patent applications.
activities.info: Patent consultancy, with particular reference to the technical-scientific component, including drafting of patents, assistance in infringement disputes, technical consultancy.

activities.title: Scientific Activities
activities.description: Contract researcher and scientific support in pharmaceutic, cosmetic and nutrition.
activities.info: Consultancy and bibliographic research for scientific support in the pharmaceutical, cosmetic and nutritional fields for the compilation of rationales, clinical evaluations, technical dossiers, material for scientific communication.

activities.title: Regulations
activities.description: Regulatory assistance in pharmaceutical, cosmetical and nutritional fields.
activities.info: Advice on regulatory aspects relating to all aspects relating to the production and marketing of cosmetic products (Regulation (EC) No. 1223/2009 of the European Parliament and of the Council, of 30 November 2009, on cosmetic products and related updates), including notification of cosmetic products on the European portal and the evaluation of the safety of cosmetic products with the preparation of the Cosmetic Product Safety Report (CPSR) and Product Information File (PIF) as required by Reg. Regulation (EC) no. 1223/2009.
